title: Don’t Discriminate Against Species - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Co-Workers   Comedic Undertone   Cultivation   Dragons   Familial Love   Fantasy World   Fated Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Helpful Protagonist   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Monsters   Mythical Beasts   Naive Protagonist   Near-Death Experience   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Butterfly's Shadow Beneath the Moon   Yue Xia Die Ying   月下蝶影
description:
Fu Li was a yaoguai from the countryside who had never seen the world. After entering the city, his biggest dream was to become a civil servant and leave his name in historical records.

However… He didn’t have a university degree. Not even a high school graduation certificate.

So, even a yaoguai would not be able to find a good job if they didn’t study well.>
